Title:               Average Weekly Hours of All Employees: Other Services in North Carolina
Series ID:           SMU37000008000000002
Source:              U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics, Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis
Release:             State and Metro Area Employment, Hours, and Earnings (Not a Press Release)
Seasonal Adjustment: Not Seasonally Adjusted
Frequency:           Monthly
Units:               Hours per Week
Date Range:          2007-01-01 to 2018-10-01
Last Updated:        2018-11-16 4:08 PM CST
Notes:
